name: Uprising (fahmi-san33, rafifrr, lycopium, EncryptedScripts, redfield7007, Agustinus Zefanya, yaswisnu)
name_original: Uprising (fahmi-san33, rafifrr, lycopium, EncryptedScripts, redfield7007, Agustinus Zefanya, yaswisnu)
description: This game is themed easy to play hard to master. because it's really hard to finish. This game tells the story of a prisoner who is trying hard to climb up through the obstacles that exist to achieve his goal of getting out of prison. This game can be played by all ages
